name: RainbowDropper
description:
CONTROLS

  • Right Arrow Key for the player to move right for Windows.
  • Left Arrow Key for the player to move left for Windows.
  • Touch the Right Side of the screen to move the player Right for Mobile.
  • Touch the Left Side of the scree to move the player Left for Mobile.

Game Objective

Your Objective is simple move Right and Left to fall into the holes and try to keep up 

with the moving screen going up too much and you will Die Go Down too much and you will Die. 

Installation

For Windows Download the zipped folder named RainbowDropper.zip once its finished Downloading open the file and Un Zipp it/Extract it then double click on The RainbowDropper.exe and Enjoy

For Mobile Install the File named RainbowDropper.apk wait till it finished downloading then click Install then your Ready to go and Enjoy.

Information

The game took me 1 week to complete it was all completely solo .Shoutout to Free Music (Music all made by him)Check him out His youtube Channel  The Game was heavily inspired by Minecraft Droppers.
